meanings.definition: Variegators: those who variegate or make something varied in color or form.
meanings.sent1: The variegators carefully selected different colors for the painting.
meanings.sent2: The variegators added a touch of blue to the otherwise monochromatic design.
meanings.sent3: The variegators decided to mix things up by using bold patterns in their artwork.
meanings.sent4: The variegators were like artists, painting the world with a palette of hues.
meanings.sent5: The variegators transformed the plain canvas into a vibrant masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Variegators: a tool or device used for variegating or adding variety to something.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a set of variegators to create unique textures in the sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The gardener relied on variegators to enhance the appearance of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The variegators made the task of decorating much more enjoyable and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The variegators worked like magic wands, bringing life to the plain surface.
meanings.sent5: The variegators were indispensable tools for the creative process.
